e7c746899d1369f942388375b43b93fbef883f57.commitMessage: Issue #3496: Enforce ReturnCount max=1 in com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.annotation, com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.ant

8c0b8bba131d164af52a0bd28150905115ffddf7.commitMessage: Issue #1487: Improve code coverage of CheckstyleAntTask

745e21f1e4d202dd8dba577585f35f7d3f10d839.commitMessage: Issue #2639: XML is removed from allowed abbreviations

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

a8c32f4d0f9efd7c31e3c490d0e1a265f0d5d5c0.commitMessage: fixed NPE when formatter type is not set

add2bdfb27494bff5fa9c305d9782f57c6170b18.commitMessage:
fixed bug 561616 (ant task should log errors, not infos)

This required a redesign of the AuditListener interface, the get/setOutputStream methoeds have been removed, as there might be listeners that have no or more than one OutputStream.

The DefaultLogger now differentiates between info messages ("started checking file ...", etc.) and error messages (style errors found by checkstyle) by writing the messages to two different OutputStreams.

c85ec6f26ade692103ac27383a87c3402b4d66ca.commitMessage:
Merged the Streamable interface into the AuditListener interface. Having them
separate served no real purpose at the moment, except to complicate the
implementation.
